name: Deep into the Woods
description:
Your dear friend Anna has been kidnapped by the wicked feylings, and it's up to you to find her. Open the way with your trusting old lantern, while the light-hating feylings try to snuff it out!
Will you be able to reach the deepest point in of woods and save Anna?

The game is *coff coff* fully working and you will not encounter bugs (excepts of layer grafics ones).  All levels are doable, but we did not manage to implement as many as we wanted. All the assets but the font (wich is free for commercial use) are made by us. We also used the A* pathfinding package for Unity.

We don't talk about the Options.

CHANGELOG (27/04):

- Players were reporting getting stuck on specific black roots colliders in level 5 and 6. We Fixed the two colliders.

- An error in the AudioManager would make it play two MainSoundtrack upon finishing the game. We added a simple if() statemant to impede that.
